contentrichtext.text: :''For the 1931 UK film, see [[Alibi (1931 film)]].'' {{Infobox film| name = Alibi | image = Alibiposter.jpg | caption = Theatrical release poster | writer = [[Elaine Sterne Carrington]] | starring = [[Chester Morris]]<br>[[Mae Busch]] | director = [[Roland West]] | producer = Roland West | cinematography = [[Ray June]] | distributor = [[United Artists]] | released = {{start date|1929|04|20}} | runtime = 90 minutes | language = English | country = United States | budget = }} '''''Alibi''''' is a 1929 American crime film directed by [[Roland West]]. The screenplay was written by West and [[C. Gardner Sullivan]], who adapted the 1927 Broadway [[stage play]], ''Nightstick'', written by [[Elaine Sterne Carrington]], [[J.C. Nugent]], [[Elliott Nugent]] and [[John Wray (actor)|John Wray]].<ref>[http://ibdb.com/production.php?id=10486 ''Nightstick''] at the [[Internet Broadway Database]]</ref> Alternate titles for the film include ''The Perfect Alibi'' and ''Nightstick''. The movie is a crime melodrama starring [[Chester Morris]], [[Harry Stubbs]], [[Mae Busch]] and [[Eleanore Griffith]]. Director West experimented a great deal with sound, music, and camera angles. ==Reception== The film was nominated for three [[Academy Awards]], including one for [[Academy Award for Best Actor|Best Actor in a Leading Role]] (Chester Morris), [[Academy Award for Best Art Direction|Best Art Direction]] ([[William Cameron Menzies]]) and [[Academy Award for Best Picture|Best Picture]]. ==Cast== *[[Chester Morris]] as Chick Williams *[[Harry Stubbs]] as Buck Bachman *[[Mae Busch]] as Daisy Thomas *[[Eleanor Griffith]] as Joan Manning Williams *[[Regis Toomey]] as Danny McGann *[[Purnell Pratt]] as Police Sgt. Pete Manning *[[Irma Harrison]] as Toots ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links == * {{IMDb title|id=0019630|title=Alibi}} * {{Amg movie|83414|Alibi}} {{Wiktionary}} <!-- Chester Morris --> {{DEFAULTSORT:Alibi (1929 Film)}} [[Category:1929 films]] [[Category:American films]] [[Category:English-language films]] [[Category:Films directed by Roland West]] [[Category:Black-and-white films]] [[Category:American crime thriller films]] [[Category:Films about organized crime in the United States]] [[Category:Police detective films]] {{crime-thriller-film-stub}}
